TopicTitle: Relay Antennas basic consumption of Electric Charge

Articles.Content:
I was thinking about a small mod, that adds a module or something, so relay antennas, have a basic consumption of electric charge.

Something like that: 

@PART[RelayAntenna5]
{

	MODULE
	{
		name = ModuleGenerator
		isAlwaysActive = true
		INPUT_RESOURCE
		{
			name = ElectricCharge
			rate = 0.2
		}
	}

}

This is just a quick and dirty try out.

You could technically do this with ModuleResourceConverter.

  

		INPUT_RESOURCE
		{
			name = ElectricCharge
			rate = 0.2
		}

  

		OUTPUT_RESOURCE
		{
			name = ElectricCharge
			rate = 0.001
		}

Hi @Sharpy

Thanks for your reply.

 

The reason why i took the Generator Module from the RTG, is because you don't have to activate it manually.

Also it was just a quick try, to look if it is possible.

 

I don't have programming skills, so i'm not able to create new Modules or so.

Edited November 4, 2016 by 5UN6RAZ€R

 What you have is better then using ModuleResourceConverter, ModuleGenerator can do and  pretty much was doing all the ModuleResourceConverter before it made it in to stock ksp
